website_summaries.verdict: This Bonsaii is a mid-range model for the company, there are larger and higher capacity shredders, but this one works reliably and comes at a decent price.
pros: Runs quieter than some other Bonsaii models
Can run for 2 hours before needing a cool-down period
Can handle a lot of paper without problem
Easy to set up and operate
Worth the extra money for the added reliability
cons: This isn't the most durable Bonsaii
Customers who didn't like it noted it stopped working correctly sooner than they expected

customer_reviews.title: So Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold as much as my old one, but it's very quiet; that alone makes it outstanding and I don't mind emptying it. It has rollers; however, doesn't roll on carpet, which again I'm fine with since I expected that it wouldn't. Very easy to use and it does more sheets (12) for a much longer time (2 hrs) compared to my old one. I shred about once a month, so after this first shredding I used one Bonsaii lubricate sheet. I would highly recommend model 3s23 and the white color as it goes with my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shredder Works Hard
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy-duty shredder works very smoothly and hasn't jammed yet after a *lot* of business papers went through it. My only complaint is that it isn't easy to pull the shredded pieces out of the bin and put them into grocery-sized paper bags -- a lot of it inevitably ends up on the floor. But that's just a minor nuisance, easily fixed with a dustpan and broom.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Youngclaus

customer_reviews.title: Silent but shreddly
customer_reviews.text: The Bonsaii is the shredder that you want. It's smart, aesthetically charming, and shreds in silence. I used multiple versions of shredders, but everything from construction to placement is fantastic. You can see the quality craftmanship relative to other shredders on the market. On one more note, the shred bin prevents a lot of the paper from scattering paper bits. It's overall a superb product at an attractive price point.
customer_reviews.author: Yay its Peter

customer_reviews.title: Dependable shredder-worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: The shredder works like a champ. I’ve disposed of so many documents. I decided I didn’t need to retain tax returns from the 1970s. Annoying mail is dispatched easily with this machine. Its design allows almost continuous operation without overheating. I recommend using fellows oil every time the bin is emptied. Also recommend use of the oil/blade sharpener sheets once per month
customer_reviews.author: Sawfingers

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably quiet and a good shredder
customer_reviews.text: My wife runs a tax consultancy from our home and has a lot to shred. our old shredder constantly jammed and overheated. It finally gave up teh ghost and I got this one as a replacement. It is much quieter, and shreds consistently for 20 to 30 mins. The paper feed has a bit of a lip to it that helps with feeding and works to prevent overfeeding and therefore jamming.
customer_reviews.author: Brusselsillini

customer_reviews.title: Design/construction much better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy so far, after 2 hours use. Quiet enough I can sit and listen to music or tv while feeding it for an hour+. Our other shredder is much noisier, stalls to cool every 20 minutes. This (Bonsai) shredder shows better design/engineering and construction under the hood and up front: thermostat controlled fan, touch controls, bigger bin, clear and complete instructions. Staples no problem, neither paper clips-although I'd minimize those because I think they wear the rollers faster.
customer_reviews.author: Tech and Art supplies

customer_reviews.title: Works great but will not shut off
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for several months now and it worked great. However, now It does not shut off on its own. Before, when I shredded something, the shredder would run for an additional 5-10 seconds before stopping. Now when I shred something, the thing just keeps going and going until I manually hit the power button. Other than that Inconvenience, it’s a great shredder and can take many sheets at a time!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia R

customer_reviews.title: Truly does run for two hours straight!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to shred many boxes of financial papers quickly, and I purchased this when my old shredder began leaving large parts of pages intact. This shredder truly does run for 2 hours before needing to cool down. It's also very quiet when compared to my previous shredder. Best of all, it does a great job of shredding large amounts of paper. It's the best shredder I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: JayBeeBee

customer_reviews.title: It's quiet
customer_reviews.text: I've used cheap shredders, and a fairly heavy duty one at work. I try to stick to around 6-8 sheets at a time. I got rid of a decade's worth of old tax and other records at one go, over 2 baskets full. No overheating and no jams. It was a bit more than I wanted to spend, but not that much more than other, louder shredders.
customer_reviews.author: MarkD

customer_reviews.title: Love this shredder
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 other shredders and this one out performs all of them together. It can be messy emptying it, but as long as you don’t over fill, no problem. Wish I would have just spent the extra in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: nancy g

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is very quiet, easy to move and use. It runs for a long time without overheating- in the event that it does, it’s only down a few minutes before restarting.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, Quiet and more Quiet
customer_reviews.text: That's it! We have owned other shredders in the past and all had the same issues. Overheating to quickly and shutting down and Noise, Noise and more noise. Shredding had to be all you wanted to do because you couldn't even hold a conversation. Yes, the previous shredders cost less money, so the question becomes is this shredder worth the price? Yes. We haven't used it long enough to comment on durability or longevity, but, I can say the longevity of my hearing has increased with this one.
customer_reviews.author: sacragious

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, seems to run longer than all the others we had and its quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shredder but expect a mess when emptying the container
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is a powerful shredder that does a fantastic job of shredding and it will keep going for up to two hours before overheating. The bad news is that this company didn't think about how to pull out the container without having shredded paper all over the floor! It's a shame that this wasn't rectified before putting it out for sale.
customer_reviews.author: Nor'easter

customer_reviews.title: Works fine!
customer_reviews.text: For the first time, I am able to take those darn AARP mail adds and shred them without opening them first! It is so much quieter than my last shredder it's unbelievable!! We are very happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Jung

customer_reviews.title: Eats, and eats, and eats some more!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is killer it’s just keeps going and going so quiet I haven’t had any jams or issues and I have shredded quite a bit!
customer_reviews.author: Pinkgirl22jg

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Amazing machine. I use mine to chop up all the smaller size cardboard boxes I get everyday. Plus all my private info. My landlord is a creep who spies on all his tenants.
customer_reviews.author: 1008 Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Fun shredding.
customer_reviews.text: This gobbles up the most stubborn of stacks, in the most cheerful of dispositions. Staples are not a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: SOLID

customer_reviews.title: This is a quiet, well made shredder that is absolutely awesome
customer_reviews.text: Old shredder just did not do the job this one does. Constantly clogging, noisy and irritating. Would definitely purchase another for someone in family. I would give this a 10 star rating if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice decorative style
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I’ve had MANY shredders over the past few years. This seems like a good heavy duty machine. I hope it lasts a long time. The design makes it easy to disguise in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly St. John Cantwell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Shredding Ability
customer_reviews.text: This Bonsaii shredder is super sturdy and tough. It easily shreds 10 pages or more in continuous reps without needing to rest or have the blades cleaned. Further, it is very easy to figure out—one button to turn on, one button to start shredding. Though it isn’t whisper quiet (honestly, what shredder under $200 is?) it is fairly quiet emitting only a low grade hum. Excellent choice for size, ability and price.
customer_reviews.author: Hitchens

customer_reviews.title: Best shredder we have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. We have had the shredder for 6 weeks. It is used daily without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomerIndianapolis

customer_reviews.title: Best shredder ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shredder! Its quiet, easy to use,well made and super cute (If I can say that! ) its worth yr money !!!
customer_reviews.author: Kei.

customer_reviews.title: Jam free heavy duty shredder
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is a little work horse. It's quiet, and operates with continuous non jamming action. Very glad I got this shredder!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm
customer_reviews.text: My unit continues to run when nothing is inserted. The only way to stop it is to turn the whole unit off. Other than that it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Construction Guru

customer_reviews.title: Bonsali EverShred Pro 3S23
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised! Perfect size, quiet and I shred a whole bag of tax information without one delay .,.. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: getabout

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is strong.
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Runs strong doesn't bog down. Large basket is easy to empty. I'm happy I got it. I use everyday for business.
customer_reviews.author: DaveinfwbJeep

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This heavy duty shredder really lived up to the qualities described. We had no issue with it in the short time we kept it. My husband and I did the calculation of cost of shredder and time spent shredding and realized it was easier to have a shredding service monthly. We are returning it for no fault of the product, just a lifestyle choice.
customer_reviews.author: Flora Brahmbhat

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great shredder so far, hope it lasts longer than the last three I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie LeCompte

customer_reviews.title: Quite
customer_reviews.text: So far this unit works great, I gave it a four because I haven't had it very long, it is quite and handles all my shredding needs, no complaints
customer_reviews.author: GTA NM

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Finally went heavy duty after wearing out lesser units almost annually. My wife shreds everything and this one is working well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shredder. Wish that I knew about this one years ago. What an easy product to use.
customer_reviews.author: JcJC

customer_reviews.title: Small but very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Great paper shredder ran it for over a hour a couple times now works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is great resolving problems
customer_reviews.text: Customer service is great resolving problems. Don't stress the machine by putting in thick junk mail envelopes.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: unit worked very well for 7 months, no doesn't work at all. tried to contact seller and no responce.
customer_reviews.author: chevy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time. A little slower than my previous ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. A little slower than my previous shredder but much quieter and stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Jay J.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, Quick, and Effective!
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is SO quiet. Not at all like our previous one, and it does not interfere with other office workers or phone calls. Just thought the bin was a bit bigger. Perfect for home office use!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney G.

customer_reviews.title: Bonsaii EverShred Pro 3S23 shredder is great!
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is quiet and heavy duty. So much better than our old one. It has handled everything we have put through it. I am very happy with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann M

customer_reviews.title: Two hour run time
customer_reviews.text: Liked the 2 hour run time! This unit is very quiet and will shred 14 sheets at once.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, sturdy and efficient shredder. Be put this shredder through ringer, discarding years of tax filings and former business docs. It's still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Mogwai

customer_reviews.title: Bonsaii EverShred Pro
customer_reviews.text: Bonsaii EverShred Pro is the best shredder we have ever purchased (and we have purchased many). Would highly recommend for a home office or a small business.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very very good shredder - buy it ! Quiet and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: NY_Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine a work horse.
customer_reviews.text: A work horse I would recommend this machine for anybody to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mouton

customer_reviews.title: this shredder has done a great job for us
customer_reviews.text: So far, this shredder has done a great job for us. A good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for home or small office
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job without stopping due to over heating. Would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE KIM

customer_reviews.title: it is a good small office shredder
customer_reviews.text: it is a good small office shredder, but did not meet up to what was written about it. BUT, it does small chores. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: greg martinez

customer_reviews.title: great!!
customer_reviews.text: No reverse button, just in case I got stocked. Other than that, great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bonsaii 120-Minute Heavy-Duty Cross-Cut Paper Shredder, CD and Credit Card Shredder Machine with 14-Sheet Paper Shredding Capacity, 6-Gallon Pullout Wastebasket with Transparent Window, Black (3S23)
feature_bullets: Continuous running time up to 120 minutes without stopping for mass documents destroying;Quiet operation :58 dB low noise level will give you a quiet and smooth shredding exprience.

High-security and heavy duty cross-cut paper shredder with 14 sheets (Letter Size, 20lb) shredding capacity; Shreds paper into tiny particles measuring 5/32 by 1-3/8 inches (4mm x 35mm),Security level P-4.
Shreds paper, credit card, CD/DVD, clips, staples; Shredding speed reaches 7.2 feet per minute;Backed by 3 years warranty.

Jam protection system with auto start and auto reverse to protect you from the frustration of paper jams, overheating and overloading protection technology to keep sustainable using the shredder and prolong its lifetime.

6 gallons large pull-out wastebasket capacity for easy and less frequent emptying, a 0.37 gallons separate small bin for CD/DVD and credit card pieces collection, and the transparent window makes it easy to see when wastebasket is full. Equipped with the casters, heavy duty shredder can be moved flexibly.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars293 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
